subject: Belmont Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Rajiv Maragh was suspended for seven days for careless riding that compromised the Derby winner Animal Kingdom’s chance to win the third leg of the Triple Crown.
snippet: Rajiv Maragh was suspended for seven days for careless riding that compromised the Derby winner Animal Kingdom’s chance to win the third leg of the Triple Crown.
